entry.title: US Senate Moves Bitcoin Reserve Bill To Banking Committee ‚Äì Details
entry.summary:
At the recent Bitcoin conference in July, popular crypto-friendly senator Cynthia Lummis announced plans to introduce a bill that will allow the US government to adopt Bitcoin as a strategic reserve asset. Five days later since Lummis‚Äô declaration, there have been notable encouraging developments with what could be the most significant legislation in terms of crypto use and adoption in the US.
Lummis‚Äô Bitcoin Reserve Bill Explained
According to data from US Congress, Lummis, who is representing Wyoming, introduced a legislative bill on July 31 that will direct the US government to establish a ‚ÄúStrategic Bitcoin Reserve‚Äù program.¬† Speaking at the Bitcoin Conference in Nashville, the Democrat legislator previously explained that this new bill will order the US Treasury to acquire 1 mi‚Ä¶

entry.title: Grayscale ETH ETF Outflows Hit $2 Billion As Ethereum Price Struggles Below $3,000
entry.summary:
The Ethereum price performance has been a major source of concern for investors over the past few weeks, persisting in a downward trend. What makes the token‚Äôs struggles even more worrying is that it has not shown any signs of relief despite the recent launch of spot ETH ETFs (exchange-traded funds) in the United States.
However, it appears that the underwhelming performance of the ETH ETFs ‚Äî so far ‚Äî might even be contributing to the Ethereum price troubles in recent weeks. Specifically, Grayscale has been seeing a significant flow of capital out of its Ether fund, the Grayscale Ethereum Trust (ETHE).
Grayscale Ethereum Trust Hits $2.1 Billion In Outflows

entry.title: Support For Bitcoin Strategic Reserve Soars: Over 2,200 Letters Flood Senate
entry.summary:
Over 2,200 letters addressed to US senators within only 48 hours asking their support have given the proposed Bitcoin Strategic Reserve law great momentum. This grassroots initiative fits with the recent Bitcoin Act proposal by Senator Cynthia Lummis, which seeks to create a distributed network of safe Bitcoin vaults run by the US Treasury.
Using current Treasury money, the project suggests that the US government purchase one million Bitcoin, or roughly five percent of the whole quantity. Proponents contend that this strategic reserve might be a key instrument for lowering national debt and fighting inflation, thereby establishing the US as a leader in financial creativity.
BIG BREAKING: In just 48 hours over 2,200 letters have been sent to U.S. Senators requesting them to co-spons‚Ä¶

entry.title: Islamic State Demands Sharia Law-Compliant Crypto For Funding Terror Activities
entry.summary:
In a surprising twist, the Islamic State (IS) group is now advocating for cryptocurrency use to support its terrorist operations as long as it follows the tenets of the Sharia law, a new report has disclosed.
Compiled by the UN‚Äôs Analytical Support and Sanctions Monitoring Team, the research shows that IS associates are demanding Sharia compliance checks for the digital assets they depend on progressively to support their activities.
This is a major change as Sharia law has always been opposed to cryptocurrency. The UN report further emphasizes the thorough guidelines IS offers to its associates on crypto transfers. To enable these transactions, the terror group has even created specialist channels on the Telegram messaging service such CryptoHalal and Umma Crypto.
Sharia Complianc‚Ä¶

entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Mika guides you through the process of selling crypto and transferring it back to your bank account.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 163 - JOEVER FOR BYEDEN
entry.summary: Crypto dips then bounces on Biden-Harris switch. SOL again leads, DEX volume eclipses ETH + BNB. Biden news had led to $67m liquidations. Democrats have chance to ‚Äòregain crypto vote‚Äô. Mt Gox transfers to Bitstamp expected soon. Crypto sees $3.2bn fund inflows in 3 weeks. China company Boyaa buys $100m BTC. Polymarket saw $80m bets on Biden withdrawal. Polymarket 2024 volumes hit $500m. Elon appearance at Bitcoin Nashville rumoured. Combined SOL, BTC & ETH ETF coming: Geraci. Call skew heads to 2024 extremes in bullish sign. Plan B points to bullish setup in S2F model. Coinbase premium moves back to positive. Gensler likely resigns next year: 10x. Germany already lost $124m profit selling.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Do Crypto Degens Care About Being Scammed?
entry.summary: What's the Meta? With the rise of Pumpdotfun and rug pulls becoming a daily occurrence, why do crypto degens keep investing? Do these investors enjoy being scammed? It appears that people very often invest in meme coins that are very obviously going to rug pull. Once it happens, they just laugh it off on Twitter, is being scammed fun?!

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 162 - SOLANA LEADS THE CHARGE!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$85m. SOL leads majors ahead of ETH ETF. Rumours Trump may want BTC in strategic reserve. Trump BTC round-table tickets going for $845k. Polymarket hits volume record of $20m. ETH ETFs will get steady capital: Binance CEO. Winklevii donate $1m to try and unseat Warren. Tornado sees $1.9bn volume resurgence. New overlay attacks growing in crypto. Messari co-founder faces backlash on views. Raydium integrates with Moonpay. Tencent leads investment round in Chainbase. ZA Bank partners with stablecoin issuers.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 161 - THE BIG WIF COMEBACK?

Grayscale launches ‚ÄòDecentralised AI Fund‚Äô. Dimon may be ‚Äòchanging tune‚Äô on Bitcoin. Many alts now bounced 50-90% from lows. Vote implies 55% of Mt. Gox depositors won‚Äôt sell. BlockFi to make creditor distributions this month. WazirX exchanges sees $230m suspected breach. Vitalik warns against voting ‚Äòpro-crypto‚Äô. Vitalik & Autism Capital trade barbs. Bitcoin Magazine to hold pro-Trump fundraiser. State Street explore blockchain payments. UPbit sees 44% monthly drop in volume.

ETH spot ETFs will push ETH to $5k: Bitwise. SOL ETF will be next: Bloomberg. XRP up 35% this week ahead of potential settlement. Aethir reports $36m H1 customer revenue. Craig Wright now under threat of perjury & forgery. FTX & CFTC in $12.7bn settlement. WLD up 40% after delaying unlock schedule. Helio announces instant crypto fiat commerce. entry.title: Zoltan Istvan on AI and Human Immortality
entry.summary: Transhumanist Party founder Zoltan Istvan chats with Decrypt's Emerging Technology report Jason Nelson about his journey with transhumanism, running for office, and why he fears AI is outpacing life science and poses a threat to the quest for immortality.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 157 - ROLLBIT FRIDAY!
entry.summary: The German state sells $2bn+ BTC and has under $300m left. BTC ETF sees $800M of inflows, Mr 100 keeps buying. SOL ETF deadline set for 2025, election could be key. SOL stablecoin TVL soars on Tether & PYUSD growth. Firedancer sees the first accepted block on SOL testnet. ETH ETFs finally expected next week. Monthly active crypto addresses top 100m.
